issue.title: [Rust][DataFusion]: Implement support for the `now()` sql function
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12158](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12158). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Usecase: selecting the last 5 minutes of data

I would like to be able to run queries like this:
```
select \* from cpu where time > now() - interval '3' minute;
```

Proposed implementation:
follow postgres functions:  https://www.postgresql.org/docs/current/functions-datetime.html
